text: this is the secondary school in Duchy
town militants came last Monday night
and abducted 110 schoolchildren over
here is the dormitories where most of
the girls were at the time it was around
7:00 p.m. in the evening that they came
and on this side of the compound right
down at the far end is a gate where they
supposedly entered girls heard them
coming and trucks firing guns and
letting off explosives and they started
running from the dormitory all the way
along here this is the path that many of
the girls took to try and get away the
main exit is down that way and you can
see some of their discarded sandals
there littered all along this path here
they ran here towards the main gate but
it was locked so most of the girls ran
this way and tried to scale the wall but
what they found on the other side was
more vocal around we spoke to one girl
who managed to escape she ran off in the
other direction but she saw some of her
friends being taken and put into a truck
by the militants and as we know they
were taken away
